channel.title: Having a Small Problem

item.title: Having a Small Problem
item.dc:creator: @laggy laggy
item.description:
@laggy wrote:

I’m working on my first script, and i’ve run into a slight problem. Im working on making my form work and everything first, and i have it the way i want it to look. Now the problem i’m stuck at:

startButton.OnClick := @Start;

when SCAR gets to that line it throws the Unknown Identifier error, when i have:

procedure Start(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
Writeln(‘Started!’);
end;

already in the script

i’m using SRL…and i’m stuck

Read full topic
